public abstract class Task<W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SimpleLayoutPanel
implements HasLog, HasStartAndStop

A task that can be registered in the ExperimentWorkflow for execution.

Author:
Oliver Schmid
